marklogic.body:
LOVE LOVE LOVE the new banner ladies!!! Although, I think you are trying to kill us all Off before we even scroll down!
And the yummy just keeps coming.Â More beautiful pics since last night and I keep getting lost in the pure giddy on his face.Â There are several where he's just looking out into the ocean with the biggest-kid grin on his face... like he's thinking... Damn, this is going to be FUN!!!
This is one case where Rob is not going to be good for my productivity. I actually purposely set my alarm 15 minutes early so I could get up and peruse before having to get in my car for work this morning. I've Burned through that time and I have absolutely no desire to pack up my laptop and leave. Damn you, Rob!!! LOL!!
